price: To, kõ dai Mu tafi *da kai to, lalle Mũ, mãsu yin azãbarrãmu, wa ne a kansu.
arabic: فَإِمَّا نَذۡهَبَنَّ بِكَ فَإِنَّا مِنۡهُم مُّنتَقِمُونَ
footnotes: * Mu tafi da kai, watau Mu karɓi ranka, ka mutu, to, dã Mun yi musu azãba ke nan, dõmin sun rasa mai shiryar da su.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fa-immā nadhhabanna bika fa-innā min'hum muntaqimūna
